snippet.title: Security: The Horrible Nights - Official Trailer | The Indie Horror Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Every time you die, a new story begins. Watch the trailer for Security: The Horrible Nights to see various scary scenarios you'll face on your patrol as a security guard at a hospital in this horror anthology game with 80s retro horror pixel vibes. The trailer also reveals free DLCs will bring extra horror stories from horror experts and fans. In Security: The Horrible Nights, you are the security guard at a hospital. From your small office, you must watch the entire hospital through the security cameras. If you see a problem, you must run out and fix it! Every night, a new horror tale will unfold. If you can survive enough nights, you will learn the truth behind all the horror! Security: The Horrible Nights will be available on PC.
